description:
My home is very quiet and cozy with amazing natural light. It is a great getaway for 1 person, 2 people, a couple, or even 2 couples. 
It's 2 blocks to the beach, 1 block to the grocery store, and very close to the Beach 67th st. subway stop off the A train. Parking is very easy right in front too. Rockaway Brewery and Goody's Caribbean food (a locals fav) is 1 block away. The surf breaks by me are some of the best in the hood. Several surf schools set up at my beach too, if you want to learn!

I spent over a year picking out every detail that went into rebuilding this bungalow. The skylights and pitched ceiling create an open and airy feeling. Draw the curtains and enjoy privacy or let the sun radiate in. You will be transported to a cabin deep in the woods in the bedroom. Come discover the other special details and unexpected bursts of color.

FOOD:
Goody’s BBQ Chicken & Ribs
7018 Amstel Blvd, Arverne, NY 11692
Amazing ribs, chicken, burgers, and sides. Caribbean comfort food - 1 block from me - A locals secret and favorite. 

Thai Kitchen by the Sea
67-20 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Arverne, NY 11692
Good Thai food - walking distance to my home.

Thai Rock
375 Beach 92nd St, Rockaway Beach, NY 11693
Not walking distance, but great view on the bay. They have live music sometimes as well.

Chicks To Go
97-02 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Far Rockaway, NY 11693
Really good Peruvian spot.

Uma's
92-07 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Far Rockaway, NY 11693
Really great Uzbek food.

Rockaway Beach Surf Club
302 Beach 87th St, Far Rockaway, NY 11693
Noodle Beach - Yummy Ramen spot in cool digs.
Also just a great bar to hang out in.

Last Dragon Pizza
(URL HIDDEN)
Amazing local pizza for pick up close by. Check website for more info

Whit's End
16702 Rockaway Beach Blvd. 
Riis Point
Check Instagram for daily updates:
whitsendrockaway
Bike down the boardwalk to get here! It's a great ride:)
And some of the best food in town!

GROCERIES:

Stop and Shop
1 block from me. You can see it from my door. Huge grocery store.

COFFEE:
Rockaway Roasters
9206, Rockaway Beach Blvd, Rockaway Beach, NY 11693
Locals coffee shop serving Stumptown and good snacks

SHOPPING:
Zingara Vintage
202 Beach 91st St, Far Rockaway, NY 11693
Great vintage clothing, records, and very cool knick-knacks

Off Season
92-12 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Rockaway Beach, NY 11693
Amazing lifestyle boutique owned and run by a local

SURF SHOPS:
Breakwater
67-20 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Arverne, NY 11692
Walking distance to my home

Boarders
192 Beach 92nd Street, Rockaway Beach, NY 11693
Father/Son locals shop

Station
91-08 B Rockaway Bch Blvd. Rockaway beach, NY 11693
Newest shop in town

ART:
Rockaway Artists Alliance
rockaway(URL HIDDEN) - check for updated info

New York Arbor
(URL HIDDEN) - check for updated info

BEER:
Rockaway Brewing Co.
415 Beach 72nd
Local Brewery 1 block away from my home

YOGA:
Hot Yoga on Beach 116th 
hotyo(URL HIDDEN) - check for info

Yoga On The Rocks
(URL HIDDEN) - check for info

MEDITATION:
check b(URL HIDDEN) for the Rockaway Summer House (stuff happens in winter too)
It's just around the corner from me

I have 2 bikes you can use if your interested.
name: Modern Bungalow Escape
review: Brent's bungalow was perfect for my weekend trip to New York. It was close to everywhere we needed to go and it was so cute! I loved the decor and the simplicity of the bungalow!
